name: AWSDataPipelineDataPipelineObjectFields
description: Key-value pairs that describe the properties of a data pipeline object.

properties.name: Key
properties.desc: Specifies the name of a field for a particular object. To view fields for a data pipeline object, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

properties.name: RefValue
properties.desc: A field value that you specify as an identifier of another object in the same pipeline definition.

properties.name: StringValue
properties.desc: A field value that you specify as a string. To view valid values for a particular field, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.
